docs.abstract: Jane E Brody article on causes, implications and prevention of snoring; about 1 in 8 persons snores, more men than women, and condition is common among children under age 10 (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: THE bedroom is filled with snorts and chortles. A woman is perched, lamp in hand, ready to strike the somnolent source of the distressing sounds--her husband.
docs.snippet: THE bedroom is filled with snorts and chortles. A woman is perched, lamp in hand,  ready to strike the somnolent source of the distressing sounds--her husband.

docs.abstract: Millman, Marcia: Such A Pretty Face: Being Fat in America reviewed by Anatole Broyard; Millman por
docs.lead_paragraph: EAT women, writes Marcia Millman, are "stereotypically viewed as unfeminine, in flight from sexuality, antisocial, out of control, hostile and aggressive."
docs.snippet: EAT women, writes Marcia Millman, are "stereotypically  viewed as unfeminine, in flight from sexuality, antisocial, out of control, hostile and aggressive."
